definition: tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc

sentences.english: In back we can see the Edge will get new, chrome- ringed taillights.
sentences.chinese: 在回到我们可以看到边缘将获得新的，铬环尾灯。

sentences.english: I asked him to check the headlight and taillight as well.
sentences.chinese: Gatz帮忙，顺道请他检查车头灯和车尾灯。

sentences.english: Dual LED taillight design provides excellent visibility and a sleek profile.
sentences.chinese: 双LED尾灯设计提供了良好的知名度和圆滑的轮廓。

sentences.english: For example, there's the taillight design composed of a pair of three vertical red bars.
sentences.chinese: 举个例子，设计的尾灯是由一对三竖条红灯组成。

sentences.english: Toyota taillights best quality in the flat rate discount.
sentences.chinese: 丰田汽车尾灯在平坦的最优质的折扣价。

sentences.english: Both the headlamp and the taillight are integrated.
sentences.chinese: 无论是头灯和尾灯集成。

sentences.english: The tail lamp lightens to indicate something has gone wrong with the car.
sentences.chinese: 闪烁的尾灯表明这辆车出问题了。

sentences.english: Can you not see the red light right here?
sentences.chinese: 难道你没看见我们打了红色尾灯吗？

sentences.english: They must not be confused with the rear lights which are also red.
sentences.chinese: 切勿把煞车灯与红色车尾灯混淆。

sentences.english: The rear has a discreetly decorated boot lid and carbon fiber taillight covers.
sentences.chinese: 后方有一个谨慎的装饰启动盖子和碳纤维尾灯涵盖。

sentences.english: Keep headlights clean and working . Do the same for taillights and signal lights.
sentences.chinese: 保持前灯，尾灯和信号灯清洁和工作。

sentences.english: He smashed the headlights and taillights.
sentences.chinese: 他又砸碎了甲壳虫的前灯和尾灯。

sentences.english: And for goodness' sake, don't drive down a dark road with burned-out headlights or taillights.
sentences.chinese: 务必记住，不要黑着大灯或尾灯开到黑咕隆咚的路上。

sentences.english: I didn't know about a broken taillight.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道我有个尾灯是坏的。

sentences.english: What I liked in it were the digital instrumentations, chisel tail lamp and sharp looks.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在它是在数字仪器仪表，凿尾灯和敏锐的外观。

sentences.english: GL taillights are also now filled with LEDs as standard equipment.
sentences.chinese: 冰川尾灯现在也充满了发光二极管作为标准设备。
